response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential worth to me, reflecting its rarity and craftsmanship. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $500,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also my desire to find it a worthy owner who will appreciate and cherish it. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 500000}
